name: Gold Nanoantenna Biosensor
description: Fabrication of gold nanoantennas on nanofluidic chips for single-molecule RNA detection. Using plasmonic enhancement for improved fluorescence sensitivity with Cy5-labeled miRNA targets.

name: E-Beam Master Template
description: Creating the master template on silicon wafer using electron beam lithography. Defines the nanoantenna array geometry with 150nm bowtie structures at 500nm pitch.

name: PDMS Stamp Fabrication
description: Making negative PDMS stamps from the silicon master for soft lithography replication. Sylgard 184 with 10:1 ratio, cured at 65C for 4 hours.

name: Nanofluidic Chip Assembly
description: UV-curable polymer replica fabrication and gold deposition into antenna structures. Final bonding and channel integration for fluid delivery.

name: miRNA Detection Assay
description: Biolab validation of nanoantenna chips for miR-21 detection using Cy5-labeled capture probes. Testing sensitivity, signal enhancement, and photobleaching characteristics.
